Name: Shoemaker
About the game: Shoemaker is a unique shoe workshop simulator game where you need to fix boots Once you fix the shoe, you can collect your payment. Game Features: * jobs related to repairing footwear * jobs related to used gear that can be resold * list of repairs that needs to be done to collect your payment * level progression
Meta Title: Shoemaker: Oct 15, 2018, Racing Bros and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Shoemaker? Check out the release date (Oct 15, 2018), developer insights from Racing Bros, and a complete game summary.
